version_description:
SVS has added new functionality to its groundbreaking 16-Ultra subwoofer control and DSP app.
• Added “Screen Lock” feature to the System Settings. User can now lock the subwoofer front display buttons from the app so no adjustments can be made by accidental button presses on the subwoofer.
• Added SVS Product Registration Link to the Contact SVS Support page. Users can now access the registration page to register their product and confirm the warranty, expedite service requests and receive news and updates.
• Updated Subwoofer Display Timeout default to “Off” on the System Settings page.
• Added confirmation screen when “Factory Reset” is chosen.
• Numerous bug fixes and minor updates for better stability.
Improves performance and fixes minor bugs.

Upgrades to enhance performance and fix minor bugs. Also adds the following SVS app updates:
• Makes the app compatible with iOS12.
• Allows compatibility with groundbreaking new SVS 3000 Series Subwoofers so owners have unprecedented control of all DSP functions. SVS app now works with SVS SB-3000 and PB-3000 subwoofers.

Upgrades to enhance performance and fix minor bugs. Also adds the following SVS app updates:
• Makes the app compatible with iOS12.
• Allows compatibility with groundbreaking new SVS 3000 Series Subwoofers so owners have unprecedented control of all DSP functions. SVS app now works with SVS SB-3000 and PB-3000 models.
Improves performance and fixes minor bugs.
